name: Starfire Lords: Genesis
description:
What is Starfire Lords: Genesis?

The great families of the universe are constantly at war with each other. Some fight for peace, some fight for profit, but when the X03:2 come and seek revenge on all of them, they fall. The survivors that are left have two choices; work together, or perish.

Grab your friends, and play this original multiplayer top down shooter. Relive the wars between the families by challenging each other in deathmatch mode, or defend against the countless waves of the X03:2 and see how long you can last!

This is a demo release for the kickstarter project!
